lead_paragraph: ORGELFINGER--Caroline Mary, nee Iannone, died on February 1, 2016 of congestive heart failure at Heartlands Senior Living in Severna Park, Maryland. The youngest child of John and Carmela Iannone, she was born January 13, 1922 in Staten Island, NY. She attended Tottenville High School, graduating in 1939 with highest honors in the secretarial program, and worked in New York City. On April 3, 1948, she married Louis Orgelfinger, III, who predeceased her. During their 63-year marriage, they resided in Glen Oaks, Richmond Hill, and Munsey Park, NY, and Waynesville, NC, as well as traveling extensively. A lifelong Yankees fan, Caroline was an avid reader, and enjoyed playing golf, cross- stitching and crossword puzzles. She leaves two daughters, Gail Orgelfinger (Charles Hanna) of Severna Park, and Joan Jarrard (Ted Keller) of Flora, Indiana; a grandson, Steven L. Jarrard and great-granddaughter, Lilly Ann Jarrard; three nieces, a nephew, and many great- and great-great nieces and nephews. 1/3
